notes: Typical single dose 200-400 mg; GI/renal risk at high doses
High doses cause bleeding risk; interacts with anticoagulants
NSAID; long half-life; watch renal function
COX-2 NSAID; avoid in cardiac risk
Opioid analgesic; seizure risk at high doses
SSRI; serotonin syndrome w/ other serotonergics
SSRI; QT prolongation at high doses
Antiplatelet; avoid with strong CYP3A4 inhibitors
Safe vitamin; high doses mask B12 deficiency
Toxicity at very high chronic doses
High doses cause nausea and copper deficiency
